DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine whether muscle atrophy induce immobilization lower limb attenuate BIIB023 healthy male volunteer . The secondary objective study study population : - To determine whether muscle weakness induce immobilization lower limb attenuate BIIB023 - To assess effect BIIB023 recovery muscle mass strength immobilization - To assess effect BIIB023 histological marker muscle atrophy regeneration - To assess effect BIIB023 muscle bioenergetics base oxidative metabolism recovery kinetics - To evaluate safety tolerability BIIB023
DOC.brief_title: A Study Effect BIIB023 Muscle Atrophy Healthy Male Volunteers
